subtitle: Full Stack JavaScript Developer
about_paragraph: Hey, I'm Tom Délié a 23 years old french full-stack developer that recently graduated in software engineering. I worked as an internship student during 3 years, mainly as a Node.js back-end developer. I'm currently working as a freelance developer.
projects_symfonax_description: School project. A web app that let you watch youtube videos with your friends.
projects_efurrax_description: School project. A web app that help you find the teammate that matches your requirements.
projects_dst_description: Dev skillsets presented as a skill tree. A quick project to learn some Svelte.
projects_pixelworld_description: School project. 2D platformer game made with Godot Engine.
contact_paragraph: Want to know more? Have a talk about your project? Drop me a line and let's talk about it.
